definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: It is famous for its sunny, pleasant summer and long golden beaches.
sentences.chinese: 它以阳光明媚的怡人夏日和长长的金海岸而闻名。

sentences.english: Although the sun was shining the other day, my father took the umbrella with him to be on the safe side.
sentences.chinese: 虽然那天阳光明媚，我父亲还是带上了雨伞以防不测。

sentences.english: The weather this morning is sunny with bright sunshine and a cloudless blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上，天气晴朗，阳光明媚，碧空万里乌云。

sentences.english: Today is not one of those days. Outside, the sun is shining, birds are chirping and the dogwood tree is getting ready to bloom.
sentences.chinese: 外面，阳光明媚，鸟儿啁啾，山茱萸树正待开花。

sentences.english: They often go for a picnic in sunny days.
sentences.chinese: 他们总在阳光明媚的日子去野餐。

sentences.english: Miller's big house in the sunny Santa Clara valley.
sentences.chinese: 米勒先生的房子很大，地处阳光明媚的圣克拉拉山谷。

sentences.english: Although the sun is shining today, I still feel a little cold.
sentences.chinese: 虽然今天阳光明媚，我还是感觉有点冷。

sentences.english: BNG is located in sunny Arizona.
sentences.chinese: BNG坐落在阳光明媚的亚利桑那州。
今天是个大晴天，阳光明媚。

sentences.english: Turning round, I discovered another bright day, trees green and bright.
sentences.chinese: 转过头，又一个夏日铺满眼帘，树木葱茏，阳光明媚。

sentences.english: The steamer set out on a sunny morning.
sentences.chinese: 轮船在一个阳光明媚的早晨起程了。

sentences.english: Hope not sunshine ev'ry hour, Fear not clouds will always lower.
sentences.chinese: 不要企望时时阳光明媚，乌云哪会总是蔽日遮天。

sentences.english: The sun is bright, - the air is clear.
It's a sunny day, so off to more outdoorsy stuff.
sentences.chinese: 外面阳光明媚，今天就别宅了。

sentences.english: In the following days,although it was winter,the sun still warmed the earth.
sentences.chinese: 在随后的日子里，虽是冬天，山上白天却阳光明媚。

sentences.english: The sun is shining, we welcome the 1st English festival of Exi Primary School.
sentences.chinese: 今天，阳光明媚，我们迎来了鹅溪小学首届英语节。

definition: moderate wind, beautiful sun (idiom); fine sunny weather, esp. in springtime
(idiom) sunlight shines over all things/drenched in sunlight
see 秋高氣爽|秋高气爽[qiu1 gao1 qi4 shuang3]
early autumn/7th month of the lunar calendar
